1.label: identity-Fst: global F-statistics and pairwise Fst

2.label: identity-Rho: global F-statistics and pairwise Rho

3.label: identity-Gst: global Gst and pairwise Gst

4.label: identity-Gij: global Gst and pairwise Gij

5.label: identity-Ds: global F-statistics and pairwise Ds

6.label: size-Rst: global R-statistics and pairwise Rst

7.label: size-dm2: global R-statistics and pairwise dm2 distance

8.label: distance-Nst: global Nst and pairwise Nst

9.label: distance-Nij: global Nst and pairwise Nij

3.label: relationship coefficient (Moran's I on indiv allele freq)

R.label: Rij: Allele size correlation coefficient (I' in Streiff et al., 1998)

N.label: Nij: kinship coefficient for ordered alleles (OJ Hardy, unpublished)
